control

Class PaymentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.PaymentController

  • public class PaymentController
extends java.lang.Object
    PaymentController is the controller that responsible for get answer from the external payment company and make the purchase in DB.
    Author:
    ork

    • Method Detail

      • makePurchase

        public void makePurchase(boolean answer,
                         int action)
        The method gets answer(true, false) and action to do. this method responsible for purchasing books and subscriptions and to write the action in the DB.
        Parameters:
        answer - If "true" make a purchase, else cancel.
        action - The action what to do.

      • prepareBuy

                          java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> elementList)
        Make purchase in the DB.
        Parameters:
        type - The action type of the message that will pass to the server.
        elementList - The parameters that will pass to the server.
        Returns:
        The message that will pass to the server.
